metachat.pl.plot_summary_pathway

metachat.pl.plot_summary_pathway(ms_result=None, senspathway_rank=None, plot_senspathway_index=None, figsize=(10, 10), plot_savepath=None)[source]

Function to plot a Sankey diagram summarizing the metabolic cell communication pathways.

Parameters:

  • ms_result (Optional[DataFrame]) – A DataFrame containing the metabolic communication scores between different pathways.

  • senspathway_rank (Optional[DataFrame]) – A DataFrame containing the ranking of sensor pathways.

  • plot_senspathway_index (Optional[list]) – A list of indices specifying which sensor pathways to include in the plot.

  • figsize (tuple) – Size of the figure in inches. Default is (10, 10).

  • plot_savepath (Optional[str]) – Path to save the plot image. If None, the plot will be displayed but not saved.
